name: Moving On (Chelsea Jimenez)
description:
A RPG Maker 2000 game revolving around a heartbroken girl named Rita as she goes on a train ride to battle through the 5 stages of grief. Rita must confront her mental battles through turn-based combat and unlock acceptance from her breakup. The train will stop at 5 levels (each one representing a stage of grief), and you must battle your mental thoughts in order to obtain the gem from each level design that is inspired by each stage of grief. Collecting all five gems unlocks acceptance and restores happiness to Rita.

Note: This is currently the demo version which lets you play through the first two stages.
